inputs.text:
Im the founder + Creative CEO of FIELD.IO a design studio based in London, UK + Berlin, DE.

You can find us here: http://www.field.io
And more about me: https://www.marcuswendt.io/

It's Jan 5, we're back to work after a busy 2025. Priorities right now are:
- HR key hires for finance, shift from dual-headed to distributed leadership
- 2026 Strategy + Setting priorities
- Our cashflow + new biz pipeline (as always)
- Continuing this discussion with my MD about his role
- Brand + PR (which feeds into newbiz)
- Our Berlin studio plans
- Our Hong Kong expansion plans

and in general providing leadership and vision to our team of ~50 employees!

My kids:
Elio Marcus Wendt 30 March 2025
Luca Milai Wendt 03 May 2022
Rafael George Anthony Wendt 02 February 2020

My wife: Celine Therese Wendt 17 July 1983 (married 11 Oct 2019)

We're currently in Wellington, New Zealand on a visit to the grandparents Tony + Maureen Parun (here in Petone, Lower Hutt)

We live in our house at 286 Capworth St, E10 7BG London, UK.
We're currently in the middle of a kitchen + renovation project... hopefully completed around April-May 2026.

Also my closest friends:
Will Denning, Philipp von Lintel, Christian Klotz, my friend + neighbour Andrea Cuius (currently very sick/ stage-4 cancer),
the Epping Eagles (Will Denning, Ondrej Zunka, Lukas Voir) my London gravel bike designer friends

Im a passionate cyclist/ runner/ adventurer.
For 2026 I signed up for my most ambitious calendar yet!

ULTRA-BIKEPACKING SEASON:
- FURTHER LOSTWAYS - March 19 (750km, early season opener)
- HELLENIC MOUNTAIN RACE - May 23 (922km Greece) - PRIMARY GOAL, training for CTL 130
- SILK ROAD MOUNTAIN RACE - August 15 (2,052km Kyrgyzstan) - aim to complete as proud mid-pack
- TAURUS MOUNTAIN RACE - October 14 (1,460km Turkey) - season finale

https://www.themountainraces.cc
https://www.strava.com/athletes/13736588

I'm currently exploring several product / startup ideas:

- Meridian: A personal fitness command center with AI coaching for serious endurance athletes.
- Cascade: A visual programming framework for creative coders.
- Lucient: An AI-native operating system for physical spaces.
- Streifzüge: My artistic practice focused on capturing fleeting moments.
